key_takeaways: Solution: Use ChatGPT to learn coding (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Add AI features to existing popular app concepts rather than creating completely new ideas (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Organic TikTok growth with small creators (Channel: viral)
Growth Tactic: Facebook, TikTok, and Google ads strategy (Channel: paid-ads)
Growth Tactic: Apple Search Optimization (ASO) and Apple Search Ads (ASA) (Channel: seo)
